Package com.kinvey.persistence.query

To make use of the more advanced querying mechanisms.

Interface Summary
Query Builder interface for creating a Kinvey data query.
 

Class Summary
GroupBy A modifiable set of json fields specifically formated to represent a mongodb groupby json object.
GroupBy.Avg  
GroupBy.Count  
JsonQueryBuilder Builder class used to construct kinvey server queries for data objects.
LimitQueryModifier Add this to a SimpleQuery.setLimitQueryModifier(LimitQueryModifier) object to get query limit behavior from a query request to the server.
QueryOperators A convenient set of constants representing a valid query operator.
SimpleQuery Used to construct a valid Kinvey data query to send to the server.
SkipQueryModifier Add this to a SimpleQuery.setSkipQueryModifier(SkipQueryModifier) object to get skip behavior.
SortQueryModifier Add this to a SimpleQuery.setSortQueryModifier(SortQueryModifier) object to get sort behavior.

SortQueryModifier.Order  
 

Exception Summary
 

Package com.kinvey.persistence.query Description

To make use of the more advanced querying mechanisms. The main builder class SimpleQuery is used to construct data queries to be sent to the Kinvey servers.

Alternatively the server can be instructed through a query to apply special rules like sort, limit, or skipping. These are useful when needed to page through a number of results on the client.
